title: "Trying to reconnect" while playing from Mexico.
body: I'm trying to play from Mexico, but every single time I enter a match, I get the "Trying to reconnect" message (which doesn't happen in LAN). I think it's not my internet since I have less than 100 ms, but still every 5~10 minutes I get the same error. Is there any solution to my problem? I cannot play normal games until I get that problem solved. Thanks for reading

replies.body: I solved the issue running the legacy client instead of the new beta. It might work for you.

Since our NA and LAN servers reside in different geolocations, your issue is likely caused by pathing problems to our NA servers. Before we dive into some traceroute to confirm that, I'll need you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can ensure your local network settings are A-Okay.

Let me know if those steps improved your ability to reach our servers.
